name: Tomblr - Tumblr Logo
description: A fun version of the Tumblr logo for all the Tom Hiddleston fans out there!
additional_info: (I'm a new script maker, so I wasn't sure how to add this to the actual code, but once you install the code, you're gonna want to go into "Manage Styles" and then go into "Edit" for this code. Then you go under the code box where it says "Applies to: URL", and you click on the one that says "URL starting with" and just put http: //www.tumblr.com (no spaces in the URL), or else, for some reason, the code showed up on Twitter as well! Strange! Hope that helps! ^^)
